title: Started PhD
description: Began my PhD at ETH Zurich.

title: Became Head TA
description: Appointed head teaching assistant for the Hands-On Deep Learning course.

title: PhD Aptitude Colloquium Passed
description: Successfully passed my Aptitude Colloquium, marking my definitive admission at ETH Zurich as a PhD student.

title: DCC Paper Accepted
description: Our paper on Conditional Hallucinations for Image Compression was accepted at the 2025 Data Compression Conference (DCC).

title: Mind the Gap Accepted
description: Our paper 'Mind the Gap: Removing the Discretization Gap in Differentiable Logic Gate Networks' was accepted.
